entry.title: Home for the Holidays by Madison Vining Bundle of Four
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Bundle of 4
Price: 106.40

Home for the Holidays smells exactly like that: coming home for the holidays. It’s the warmth of a friendly hug when you walk through the door, the nostalgia of family traditions, and the joy of time spent together. This NEW fragrance is a one-of-a-kind, exclusive creation in collaboration with our friend Madison @madisonviningblog.

"I wanted it to smell like, that is, the feeling of coming home to a place that is your soft place to land, where you're accepted and loved without question. I think we nailed it.

Get each candle for only $26.60 each when you purchase a bundle of four! (Save $45.60!)

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 64 hours of burn time per candle (256 hours total). This fresh and earthy fragrance features a moderate strength and an aroma of orange peel and sweet citrus with refreshing notes of apple, berry, and eucalyptus, intertwined in a nostalgic, cozy blend of balsam, pine, cedar, and sandalwood.

INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural, paraffin free soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Sulfate free, phthalate free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g)

DIMENSIONS: 5” x 3” x 3”

Enjoy these and other fragrances in our curated candle bundles + save up to $35.

entry.title: Safety Matchbox
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type:
Price: 7.00

Safety matches are a must-have for candle care! Our Safety Matchbox features a Matthew 5:16 design "let your light shine before others" on one side and hand-drawn match sticks on the other side. 

Each box contains approximately 15, easy to use 3" wooden matches. There's something EXTRA satisfying about striking a match to light your favorite Antique Candle Co.® candle!

Enjoy more unique candle accessories.

 

*Products containing matches are unable to be shipped to addresses in Alaska and Hawaii at this time.*

entry.title: White Candle Warmer Lamp
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Home Decor
Price: 42.00

Enjoy your favorite candle without the flame when you pair our Mason Jar Candles with our NEW White Candle Warmer Lamp! This modern, elegant lamp is uniquely designed with ‘top-down’ technology to create the cozy ambiance of a glowing candle, without the flame, while filling your space with your favorite smells.

Place your candle (up to 22 oz, or up to 6” tall) on the wooden base. We recommend using the 16 oz Mason Jar candle size for best results. Use the easy-flip switch on the cord to turn your lamp on and start melting the surface of your candle to release fragrance within minutes. Allow entire surface of candle to melt at least 0.5-1” before turning off. The same wax can be melted 2-3 times, then carefully dispose of melted wax to allow the un-melted, fragranced wax underneath to melt and freshen your space.

 

INCLUDES: NP5 Warming Bulb (25 W 120 V). 3 ft cord with easy-to-use on/off switch.

DIMENSIONS: 7.75” x 5.25” x 10.75”

 

Shop more Home Décor and Candle Looks in our décor shop.

entry.title: Wick Dipper
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Accessory
Price: 12.00

Wick Dippers are a must-have for candle care! This stainless steel dipper combines luxury with utility and is a great tool to ensure you get the most out of your candle. Available in Black, Gold, or Silver.

A Wick Dipper is easy to use and allows you to safely extinguish a flame without smoke by carefully dipping it into the melted wax. This tool also allows you to adjust or re-center your candle wick if needed, and remove unwanted debris without a mess. Keeping your candle clean helps it continue to burn evenly from start to finish. That means longer lasting candles and more YUMMY smells!

Enjoy more unique candle accessories.

entry.title: Wick Trimmer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Accessory
Price: 18.00

Wick trimmers are a must-have for candle care! This stainless steel Wick Trimmer is uniquely branded for your Antique Candle Co.® collection, combines luxury with utility, and is a great tool to ensure you get the most out of your candle. It is heavy duty yet lightweight to make trimming quick and easy. The round blades are ideal for making clean cuts and catching excess trimmings. Available in Black, Gold, or Silver.

Trimming your candle wick to 1/4" - 1/2" after each burn keeps your candle clean and helps it continue to burn evenly from start to finish. That means longer lasting candles and more YUMMY smells!

Enjoy more unique candle accessories.

entry.title: Candle Snuffer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Accessory
Price: 18.00

Candle Snuffers are a must-have for candle care! This Candle Snuffer is uniquely branded for your Antique Candle Co.® collection, combines luxury with utility, and is a great tool to ensure you get the most out of your candle. Available in Black, Gold, or Silver.

Extinguishing the flame of your candle after each burn with a candle snuffer keeps your candle clean and helps it continue to burn evenly from start to finish. That means longer lasting candles and more YUMMY smells!

Enjoy more unique candle accessories.

entry.title: 2 oz sample
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: 2 oz Candle
Price: 8.00

Our mini 2 oz jar Mason Jar Candles are poured with YOUR fragrance of choice to add a perfect touch of modern farmhouse flare to any home. These candles make amazing gifts for friends and family, or to treat yourself!

BURN TIME: Up to 15 hours of burn time. 
 
INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials. 

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans. 
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!) 
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks. 
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free. 

WEIGHT: 1.7 oz (47.5 g) 
 
DIMENSIONS: 2.25" x 2.25" x 2" 

Looking for a larger size? Enjoy all your favorite scents in 16 oz candles.
